law.catch_line: Powers And Duties Of The Department.
law.full_text:
POWERS AND DUTIES OF THE DEPARTMENT. (Amended by Ord. No. 179,327, Eff. 12/10/07, Oper. 1/1/08.)
95.108.1. GENERAL. The powers of the Department and the Board are enumerated in Section 98.0403.1 of the Los Angeles Municipal Code.
95.108.2. INTERPRETATION.
1. If two or more pertinent limitations are not identical, those limitations shall prevail that provide the greater safety to persons, property or public welfare.
2. The Superintendent of Building or a duly authorized representative is empowered to make all interpretations concerning the provisions of this Code.
95.108.3. RIGHT OF ENTRY. Section 108.3 of Chapter 1, Division II of the C.M.C. is adopted by reference. (Amended by Ord. No. 181,685, Eff. 5/2/11.)
95.108.4. STOP ORDERS. Section 108.4 of Chapter 1, Division II of the C.M.C. is adopted by reference. (Amended by Ord. No. 181,685, Eff. 5/2/11.)
95.108.5. AUTHORITY TO DISCONNECT UTILITIES IN EMERGENCIES. Section 108.5 of Chapter 1, Division II of the C.M.C. is adopted by reference. (Amended by Ord. No. 181,685, Eff. 5/2/11.)
95.108.6. AUTHORITY TO CONDEMN EQUIPMENT. Section 108.6 of Chapter 1, Division II of the C.M.C. is adopted by reference. (Amended by Ord. No. 181,685, Eff. 5/2/11.)
95.108.7. CONNECTION AFTER ORDER TO DISCONNECT. Section 108.7 of Chapter 1, Division II of the C.M.C. is adopted by reference. (Amended by Ord. No. 181,685, Eff. 5/2/11.)
95.108.8. LIABILITY. Section 108.8 of Chapter 1, Division II of the C.M.C. is adopted by reference. (Amended by Ord. No. 181,685, Eff. 5/2/11.)
95.108.9. COOPERATION OF OTHER OFFICIALS AND OFFICERS. Section 108.9 of Chapter 1, Division II of the C.M.C. is adopted by reference. (Amended by Ord. No. 181,685, Eff. 5/2/11.)

Powers And Duties Of The Department.

law.html:
POWERS AND DUTIES OF THE DEPARTMENT. (Amended by Ord. No. 179,327, Eff. 12/10/07, Oper. 1/1/08.)

95.108.1.  GENERAL.  The powers of the Department and the Board are enumerated in Section 98.0403.1 of the Los Angeles Municipal Code.

95.108.2.  INTERPRETATION.

1. If two or more pertinent limitations are not identical, those limitations shall prevail that provide the greater safety to persons, property or public welfare.

2. The Superintendent of Building or a duly authorized representative is empowered to make all interpretations concerning the provisions of this Code.

95.108.3.  RIGHT OF ENTRY.  Section 108.3 of Chapter 1, Division II of the C.M.C. is adopted by reference.  (Amended by Ord. No. 181,685, Eff. 5/2/11.)

95.108.4.  STOP ORDERS.  Section 108.4 of Chapter 1, Division II of the C.M.C. is adopted by reference.  (Amended by Ord. No. 181,685, Eff. 5/2/11.)

95.108.5.  AUTHORITY TO DISCONNECT UTILITIES IN EMERGENCIES.  Section 108.5 of Chapter 1, Division II of the C.M.C. is adopted by reference.  (Amended by Ord. No. 181,685, Eff. 5/2/11.)

95.108.6.  AUTHORITY TO CONDEMN EQUIPMENT.  Section 108.6 of Chapter 1, Division II of the C.M.C. is adopted by reference.  (Amended by Ord. No. 181,685, Eff. 5/2/11.)

95.108.7.  CONNECTION AFTER ORDER TO DISCONNECT.  Section 108.7 of Chapter 1, Division II of the C.M.C. is adopted by reference.  (Amended by Ord. No. 181,685, Eff. 5/2/11.)

95.108.8.  LIABILITY.  Section 108.8 of Chapter 1, Division II of the C.M.C. is adopted by reference.  (Amended by Ord. No. 181,685, Eff. 5/2/11.)

95.108.9.  COOPERATION OF OTHER OFFICIALS AND OFFICERS.  Section 108.9 of Chapter 1, Division II of the C.M.C. is adopted by reference.  (Amended by Ord. No. 181,685, Eff. 5/2/11.)
